mainCard.title: I'm Matias
mainCard.subtitle_2: I'm currently studying Systems Engineering at UNICEN (Argentina)

presentationText.subtitle_1: I love knowing how stuff works in detail and working on complex systems
presentationText.subtitle_2: This portfolio is from 2024, since then I learned a lot of new abilities, so I set a goal to improve / change this portfolio
presentationText.subtitle_3: Even finished a ThreeJS course by Bruno Simon, which this portfolio doesn't use

projects.subtitle_1: Apart from formal experiences I spent most of my time whether learning about how old retro systems work, programming my own little projects, or working as a cameraman for sport events!
